docblock.description: CarmaLink SDK for PHP
OAuth-PHP (MIT License) is required to use this library.
"Abstract" class representing minimum properties of a CarmaLink
docblock.long-description: This class represents a possible starting point for an abstraction of a CarmaLink. The getters/setters below are required for some of the functionality in this SDK.

docblock.description: Set CarmaLink ID or serial number
CarmaLink's serial / ID
Set CarmaLink engine fault
Get CarmaLink engine fault config
Set CarmaLink global buzzer volume Can be used to override when setting a configuration which supports buzzer.
Get global CarmaLink volume setting
Set CarmaLink location tracking / GPS functionality
Get CarmaLink location functionality
Sets the CarmaLink's update interval

tag.name: param
tag.description: pingTime The update interval in milliseconds

docblock.description: Gets the CarmaLink's update interval
Set CarmaLink speed limit
Get CarmaLink speed limit
Set CarmaLink brake limit
Get CarmaLink brake limit
Set CarmaLink acceleration limit
Get CarmaLink acceleration limit
Set CarmaLink idle time limit
Get CarmaLink idle time limit
Exception class exclusive to this namespace.

tag.name: todo
tag.description: Add custom error codes, perhaps include any HTTP codes received.

constant.name: INVALID_API_KEYS_PROVIDED
constant.value: "The API key or API secret provided was incorrect."

docblock.description: Constructor
Emulates an enum which defines the status of a CarmaLink configuration.
When sending configurations for buzzer volume, please use these constants.
Type of CarmaLink configuration.
docblock.long-description: When querying the API by either retrieving data or setting the CarmaLink, one of the class constants should be used as the report_type parameter.

tag.name: var
tag.description: Configuration types which use the buzzer property.

property.name: $valid_config_types
property.default: array(self::CONFIG_OVERSPEEDING, self::CONFIG_IDLING, self::CONFIG_STATUS, self::CONFIG_ENGINE_FAULT, self::CONFIG_HARD_BRAKING, self::CONFIG_HARD_ACCEL, self::CONFIG_TRIP_REPORT, self::CONFIG_NEW_DEPLOYMENT)

docblock.description: Helper to determine if a string matches a valid configuration type.
Helper to determine if a configuration type uses the buzzer property.
Represents a CarmaLink configuration.
Constructor
Sets the protected member variable if valid.
Converts object to associative array.
Determines if current configuration type utilizes a buzzer property.
Utility method to create a new Config instance based on a device and report type.

tag.name: param
tag.description: device A custom data object representing a CarmaLink

docblock.description: Shortcut method which retreives a configuration object and converts to an array.
Main interface to use the CarmaLink API.

tag.name: var
tag.description: Optional cURL options. Can be set depending on need.

tag.name: var
tag.description: Whether to use additional cURL options when sending API requests

tag.name: var
tag.description: Whether to use SSL, should be true for production.

tag.name: var
tag.description: Whether to use debug, should be false for production.

docblock.description: Constructor
docblock.long-description: Creates a new instance of an CarmaLinkAPI based on OAuth keys and server address. Additionally you can specify if you would like debugging enabled.

tag.name: param
tag.description: consumer_key Valid API key provided by CarmaSys

tag.name: param
tag.description: consumer_secret Valid API secret provided by CarmaSys

tag.name: param
tag.description: server_options Array of 'HOST','PORT', and 'HTTPS' which the API will use

docblock.description: Gets the relative path to the root endpoint of the API
Gets the root URI for and API endpoint
If parameter is an array it will join it using "."
Shortcut to getReportData w/ TRUE for the returnAllData param

tag.name: param
tag.description: parameters Key=>value parameters for data filtering to be added to the query string

tag.name: return
tag.description: Assoc. array of HTTP response code and HTTP body content

docblock.description: Gets a CarmaLink data view/report based on provided parameters.

tag.name: param
tag.description: parameters Key=>value parameters for data filtering to be added to the query string

tag.name: param
tag.description: returnAllData If set to true will return assoc. array of HTTP code and HTTP body

tag.name: return
tag.description: If returnAllData param is true will return assoc. array of HTTP code and HTTP body otherwise, will return false on error and a JSON string on success

docblock.description: Sets up parameters for a configuration update call

tag.name: param
tag.description: serials Serial number(s) of the CarmaLink(s)

tag.name: param
tag.description: endpoint Empty endpoint reference for the API call

docblock.description: Retrieves a configuration object from the CarmaLink based on parameters

tag.name: return
tag.description: On success returns JSON-formatted object, on failure false

docblock.description: Takes a response array from a putConfig or deleteConfig request and returns the proper type / value.

tag.name: param
tag.description: response_data Associative array of response code and body

tag.name: return
tag.description: for single queries will return true/false, for multiple queries will return JSON string

docblock.description: Put / send a CarmaLink a new configuration

tag.name: param
tag.description: serials Serial number(s) of the CarmaLink(s)

tag.name: param
tag.description: config_array Array representation of a CarmaLink\Config object

docblock.description: Delete a configuration from a CarmaLink

tag.name: param
tag.description: serials Serial number of the CarmaLink

docblock.description: Performs GET request to API

tag.name: param
tag.description: parameters Any query string parameters to send

docblock.description: Performs PUT request to API

tag.name: param
tag.description: parameters Associative array of options to send

docblock.description: Performs DELETE request to API
All API requests filter through this method.

tag.description: if true, the method will return an associative array if any updates or deletions had errors
